name: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise
overview: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise is the first game in the longest pachinko gambling series (they continue the series in the Playstation 2 console) made by Irem, the game features a library, 2 pachinko machines and also a story mode in which the player is a young pachinko gambler that wants to become millionaire playing pachinko machines and impress beautiful girls with his pachinko skills.
